programme.title: Code Of Law - EP 1
programme.desc: A severed head is found in Orchard Road. The grisly findings continue with the torso and limbs of the victim, a Filipino maid. As Insp Han and SSgt Razali investigate the crime, they are surprised to find the trail leading to the victim's best friend, a petite Filipino maid by the name of Rosa. The police investigations, and the subsequent trial, uncover not only the details behind the grisly end to a long friendship, but also an illegal moneylending scheme among Filipino maids.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 7
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 6
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Haotian invests the stolen money secretly. Zhili cares for Wenying when the latter sprained her leg; the staffs in the company gossips about them. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)浩天悄悄地把偷走的钱拿去投资。文英扭伤脚，知力细心照顾，各同事看见大为侧目，浩天借意加盐加醋，中伤文英和知力。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 49
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 2 Say It! Sr 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, En Lai and Gurmit Singh becomes the kids' nanny! Besides needing to deal with the cute and innocent kids, they have to communicate with uninvited guests at their home, a troublesome auntie, and bad guys at the park! Will they be able to use Mandarin to handle these situations? (重)这一集，恩来和葛米星将要当小朋友的保姆！蔡保姆和葛保姆要应付的考官包括：单纯天真的小朋友、上门拜访的不速之客、"问题多多"的阿姨、坏人等等！他们的华语能够应付这么多不同的大小考官吗？在好好说慢慢讲的过程中又会发生哪些笑料呢？.

Unable to hold back further, Gui Qiang then reveals himself as her online friend and that he had liked her all along! (PG)(重)贵强向思今道歉，约她一起吃饭，打算送上礼物向她表白。途中两人遇到凯威的表妹琦琦，思今向她打听凯威的消息，却得知凯威已经车祸身亡。思今难以置信，坚信神秘网友就是凯威，一直在身边鼓励她。贵强忍无可忍表明自己才是她的网友，一直喜欢着她！.

He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. (重) 美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) A foreign worker who once helped Wei Ren fix his computer is moving house. Wei Ren and Ting Xuan offer to help him. While helping him, they start to develop some feelings for each other. As they come into physical contact, their hearts start beating quickly, and they suspect they have fallen for each other. Upon reaching home, they are unable to sleep well as the memories of them spending time with each other replay in their minds. (PG)(重)曾经帮为人修电脑的外籍劳工搬家，为人和庭萱来帮忙。过程中两人对彼此产生微妙的感觉，又因为有了肢体接触，内心不禁小鹿乱撞，怀疑自己爱上对方。回家后，两人都想起与对方相处的情景，辗转难眠。.

programme.desc: Xie Ying heads down for a meal and meets a troubled-looking Gui Qiang. Finding out that Gui Qiang had been rejected by the girl he likes, she makes fun of him, causing Gui Qiang to lose his temper and leave, leaving the bracelet behind. (PG)谢颖下楼吃饭，遇到心事重重的贵强，手里拿着首饰盒子。她好奇打开盒子来看，见是她之前叫贵强买的手链。谢颖得知贵强被喜欢的女人拒绝，有些幸灾乐祸地取笑他，贵强突然大发脾气，丢下手链径直离去。.

The winning art piece will then be decided by votes from MPs, arts professionals, as well as residents staying nearby. programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The Philippines has the biggest Japanese community in Southeast Asia, with many arriving in the early 19th century. They bore the wrath of the locals after WWII, though this has dissipated through the years. Still, many have mixed feelings on their identity. Where do they truly belong? (重)19世纪初日本劳工的涌入，促使菲律宾达沃的麻蕉出口蓬勃发展，并成功蜕变成菲律宾最早现代化的城市之一。而菲律宾也是东南亚住有最多日本人的国家。多年以来，许多生活在菲律宾的日本后裔总是面对一种矛盾，他们是日本人，而菲律宾却是他们成长的地方，他们该如何自处？何去何从？上一代日本后裔背负着战争的枷锁，饱受主流社会的仇视，而新一代的日本后裔虽然没有了战争的包袱，却仍然必须在破碎的家庭中成长。这一集节目探讨生活在菲律宾的日本后裔的故事。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) One of China's greatest classical novels, "Dream of the Red Chamber" details the life and food of noble families. Host Danny Yeo visits Shanghai and Yangzhou to find a sumptuous feast inspired by this literature. (重)《红楼梦》可说是中国古代社会的一本百科全书，详细地描绘了当时贵族家庭的日常生活，也有许多关于美食的描述。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循古代名著的撰写，走访扬州与上海，寻找依据文字拼贴而出的一桌珍馐美味。.

programme.title: SAGA S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: SAGA S2 picks up the story of the two antagonists from the first installation, Zack and Ryan. The action-packed story is laces with vengeful dark secrets, betrayals and revenge. Zack, a strong-willled ex-convict who is determined to mend his past, goes head-on against his Silat Master father, Borhan. Behind Borhan's back, Zack seeks refuge in Borhan's nemesis, Ryan, who encourages him to explore his deep interest in Mix Martial Arts. Zack finds out he is merely a pawn in Ryan’s mission to pay off his debt to Rio. Sofea witnesses an unconscious Borhan being handled by Farouk and informs Zack. Alarmed, they seek Farouk out but had no proof of him being connected to Borhan’s disappearance. Zack is seriously injured while defending himself and Sofea from an ambush attack by a group of hooligans. Ryan is pleased and confident the injury will cause Zack to lose an important MMA match, which he had placed a huge bet on the contender.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih - EP 3
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Dalina makes her way to Phnom Penh, where the villagers live simply in ramshackle houses without water or electricity. Together with fellow volunteer, Fazli, she soon discovers that simple innovations and recycling methods can improve their living conditions bit by bit. She collects unused and half-used soap bars from hotel customers, and brings it over to an organisation that recycle them into new soap bars for the villagers. She also discovers how a simple pet bottle, water and a bit of bleach put through the zinc roofs of the houses can shine as brightly as any electrical bulb. Finally she joins some school children, whom she is impressed by how fast they pick up singing and dancing, and even paint a new mural for their school.

programme.title: Berita Tengah Malam
programme.desc: Berita Tengah Malam yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Biz Malaysia
programme.desc: Dapatkan maklumat-maklumat semasa dan terkini mengenai ekonomi Malaysia dalam Biz Malaysia.

programme.title: Pastikan Sahih
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara santai untuk berkongsi maklumat yang benar dan sahih serta mencari kebenaran tentang berita-berita yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: Dimensi Cergas
programme.desc: Dimensi Cergas episod ini memaparkan tentang senaman tabata dalam membina kecergasan.

programme.title: Refleksi Aktif
programme.desc: Episod pertama memberi tumpuan kepada bagaimana program mengenal pasti bakat melalui proses pemilihan, penilaian, pencarian dan penyelidikan tentang bakat sukan seseorang individu dilaksanakan dengan bantuan sains sukan.

programme.title: Smart Parents
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan motivasi TV yang akan membincangkan tentang tips ibu-bapa bijak anak hebat. Episod kali ini membincangkan topik 'Biar Tak Banyak Masa Asalkan Sentiasa Berkerjasama' bersama hos Zaid Mohamad.

programme.title: Bakul Telur Emas
programme.desc: Bakul Telur Emas pada minggu ini membincangkan tentang topik Daya Lawan Masa bersama pakar perunding kewangan.

programme.title: Rencah Hidup
programme.desc: Rencah Hidup membawakan kisah keinsafan dari insan-insan yang pernah melakukan kesalahan. Episod ini memaparkan kisah insan yang terlibat dengan Pengguguran Anak.

programme.title: Hijau Dot Com
programme.desc: Hijau Dot Com episod kali ini menceritakan tentang sisa elektronik atau e-sisa.

programme.title: Al Mulki Nusantara
programme.desc: Al-Mulki Nusantara episod ini menceritakan tentang Kerajaan Barus.

programme.title: Doktor Pokok
programme.desc: Doktor Pokok pada episod kali ini membawakan permasalahan yang disebabkan oleh bakteria erwinia papayae yang sering menyerang pokok betik serta penggunaan kaedah iniokulan kerintangan sistemik teraruh (ISR) dalam proses menghasilkan betik yang berkualiti.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia

programme.desc: Join Stephen Dixon and Gillian Joseph for all the news from home and abroad, plus all the latest sport, weather and human interest interviews.

programme.title: All Out Politics
programme.desc: Adam Boulton tackles post-Brexit politics with probing interviews and passionate debate about the big issues of our time.

programme.title: Sky News
programme.desc: All the day's news from Sky News correspondents around the world.

programme.title: Ian King Live
programme.desc: In the this daily business show, Ian King tackles the biggest business and economics stories live from Sky's studios in the heart of the City of London.

programme.title: Fandom
programme.desc: Christian Slater narrates a look inside the massive phenomenon of fantasy football. Christian Slater narrates a look inside the fantasy football phenomenon, boasting more than 35 million players. From local leagues to high stakes challenges, fantasy football has transformed from a once-modest fan activity into a lucrative industry.

programme.title: A look at the SxS and Quads category
programme.desc: Take a look at the newest category of Dakar Rally, SxS and Quads, and the unveiling of Red Bull team's OT3. Take a look at the newest category of Dakar Rally, SxS and Quads, and the unveiling of the Red Bull team's OT3 which has been test driven by Dakar legends Nasser Al-Attiyah and Cyril Despres.

programme.title: A look at the Truck category
programme.desc: Take a look at the Truck category of Dakar Rally featuring, of course, the legendary Russian Kamaz trucks. Take a look at the Truck category of Dakar Rally featuring, of course, the legendary Russian Kamaz trucks. These monstrous vehicles can wrestle over even the toughest of terrains.

programme.title: Road ahead to Saudi
programme.desc: After races in Europe, Africa and South America, Dakar heads to the Middle East for the next five years. After races in Europe, Africa and South America, Dakar heads to the Middle East for the next five years. Drivers and riders are looking towards the new challenges.

programme.title: The Outer Reaches of 8-Bit
programme.desc: Discover how Konami and Sunsoft's bold musical choices pushed Japanese video game music forward. Thanks to advanced technologies during Japan's 'Bubble Era', companies like Konami and Sunsoft were able to push video game music to the next level by creating thicker sounds and creatively combining different musical genres.

programme.title: Fact or Fiction
programme.desc: Film director Asif Kapadia presents four short films that blur the lines between documentary and fiction. Director Asif Kapadia introduces four short films that blur the lines between the factual and the imaginary. These films ably employ tricks from both types of filmmaking to tell their unique stories.

programme.title: Passion & Genius
programme.desc: Film director Asif Kapadia presents a trio of short films that celebrate extraordinary people. Director Asif Kapadia introduces three short films that encounter revolutionary human subjects. A mix of documentary and narrative drama, these films all couple a focus on remarkable individuals with sharp visual storytelling.

programme.title: The Mountaineer
programme.desc: Once Chris Davenport conquered every 14,000-foot peak in Colorado, USA, he set his eyes on the highest 100. It took Chris Davenport four years to climb every 14,000-foot peak in Colorado, United States. Then he turned his attention to an even loftier goal: climbing the Centennial Peaks of Colorado, the 100 highest peaks in the state.

programme.title: The Powder Hound
programme.desc: Chris Davenport does all that he does to have fun skiing, and skiing powder is where he's at his happiest. Chris and crew go skiing in the burgeoning ski town of Revelstoke, B.C. before heading out for some runs in the backcountry. Dav shows you don't need exotic trips to enjoy skiing with friends.

programme.title: The Legend
programme.desc: Chris Davenport's innovative career and repeated personal reinvention has earned him much-deserved respect. Chris 'Dav' Davenport is a professional skier, an adventurer, and a mountaineer. He has mastered nearly every aspect of the sport, and his biggest adventure yet is trying to ski Mount Everest.

programme.title: Dakar, Senegal
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe explores the markets for food, fashion and art in Dakar, Senegal. Original host of the toughest motorsports rally in the world, Dakar, Senegal is a powerful and colourful city. Hubertus von Hohenlohe explores the local markets for food, fashion and art.

programme.title: Bomba Beach
programme.desc: Two young hip-hop strutters travel to Puerto Rico to explore the bomba dance style and the culture around it. Hosts Niki Awandee and Niek Traa connect with Puerto Rican locals to become their students, learn about the bomba dance style and its culture, and integrate them into their own style. Will they be able to live up to their teachers’ expectations?

programme.title: A new season begins
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with motocross's top riders at the start of the 2019 season. As the 2019 MX campaign begins, there are contrasting fortunes for Jeffrey Herlings, Tom Vialle, Jorge Prado and Toni Cairoli. Find out how the season starts for each rider.

programme.title: Disc Golf and Slam Dunks
programme.desc: The snowboarding mates spend a day meeting the wildlife, playing disc golf, and racing vintage snowmobiles. When the weather doesn't cooperate for snowboarding, it's time to find other distractions. Jake and Roland spend a down day hanging out with some wolves, playing disc golf, riding old snowmobiles, and having a good-old fashioned Alaskan bonfire.

programme.title: Final Powder Sessions
programme.desc: It's last call for snowfall as Jake and Roland spend their last days in Alaska riding as much as they can. Snowboarders Jake and Roland spend their last days in Alaska doing what they came to do: ride epic terrain. The last lines of the trip confirm what they always suspected – that this was going to be a life-changing experience for them and their crew.

programme.title: Epecuén
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill explores the lost Argentinian town that has been submerged for most of the past 25 years. Tragedy struck the town of Epecuén 25 years ago when rains flooded the streets. Now, Danny MacAskill hops on his trials bike to explore the lost Argentinian town, which has been submerged for the majority of time since.

programme.title: Follow the Fraser
programme.sub-title: A mountain bike excursion into the unknown
programme.desc: Three professional mountain bikers travel north through Canada, riding their way toward the unknown. Three star mountain bikers follow the Fraser River north through Canada, building and riding features along the way. Their trek takes them past their hometowns towards unridden territory and an unknown destination that holds a secret.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.sub-title: The past, present and future of snowboarding
programme.desc: Women's snowboarding is in the spotlight in a tribute to the athletes who've made the sport what it is today. This two-year film project features the world’s best female snowboarders. It pays tribute to the history of women's snowboarding and showcases how it has influenced and encouraged the current state of the sport.

programme.title: Drop Everything
programme.desc: Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to slope-side action, featuring world-class skiers. With tongues firmly in cheeks, Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to the passion behind slope-side action. Sit back and enjoy stunning scenery, awesome tricks from world-class skiers and belly-laughing comedy.

programme.title: Iron to the Core
programme.desc: Long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. Decorated long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. From preparation to race day, it's a life spent enduring gruelling trials, but every small success makes the arduous journey worth it.
